definition: to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
Yushui or Rain Water, 2nd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 19th February-5th March
wind and rain/the elements/trials and hardships

sentences.english: It rained， therefore the football match was put off.
sentences.chinese: 天下雨，所以足球比赛延期了。

sentences.english: Like the rain back in Canada that later turned to sleet.
sentences.chinese: 雨最终转化为雨夹雪，就像在加拿大那样。

sentences.english: It rained for a whole night.
sentences.chinese: 雨，滴滴答答的下了一整夜。

sentences.english: The windshield wipers swished back and forth monotonously.
sentences.chinese: 挡风玻璃上的雨刷单调地来回摆动，发出飕飕声。

sentences.english: “There’s no question that Dr. Kearns’ wiper circuit was interesting, ” Daykin says.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，卡恩斯博士的雨刷电路是非常有意思的。

sentences.english: During the night the retreat was halted in the rain for hours.
sentences.chinese: 在晚上，撤退的人马在雨中被阻达几个小时。

sentences.english: It rained on and off all day.
It is raining heavily; why don't you turn on the windshield wipers?
sentences.chinese: 下这么大的雨，你怎么不打开雨刮器呢？

sentences.english: It was like a shower of roses falling athwart this house of mourning.
sentences.chinese: 那好象是阵荡涤悲哀的玫瑰雨。

sentences.english: I feel the rain wet my face.
The rain came down with a vengeance.
In the rain, a 11)blackbird was singing beautifully.
sentences.chinese: 在雨中，一只乌鸫正在鸣唱，歌声优美动听。

sentences.english: You can taste the wind and rain of India's stormy season in each cup through its earthiness .
sentences.chinese: 尝起来有土味，能闻到印度多雨季节风和雨的味道。

sentences.english: During the night the rain changed to snow.
Tell your aunt not to take gossip seriously in the future.
sentences.chinese: 丈夫告诉姨妈，以后不要听风就是雨。

sentences.english: The new pavilion old sad, tearful eyes, drizzly rain more wine.
sentences.chinese: 故国伤心，新亭泪眼，更酒潇潇雨。

definition: fine rain/drizzle/poem by Tang poet Li Shangyin 李商隱|李商隐
snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean
Yushui or Rain Water, 2nd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 19th February-5th March
a downpour/rain bucketing down/fig. to be overwhelmed (with work or things to study)
